titles.title: Protecting Job Opportunities for Borrowers Act
Protecting JOBs Act
To prohibit States from suspending, revoking, or denying State-issued professional licenses or issuing penalties due to student default.
To prohibit States from suspending, revoking, or denying State-issued professional licenses or issuing penalties due to student default.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
